name: Mititi Clicker
description:
Hey and welcome to Mititi Clicker

This game was made my Mititi Dev, an young developer who makes games about his cat.

I personally enjoy making things about my cat. 

This is the first proyect I ever made about my cat on Unity, so please if you find any bug.

Please, be respectful.

I honestly won't fix the game because I don't understand game coding.

So don't expect the game to be ever finished.

Read the README.txt that's inside the .rar
